title: "Enable the visually impaired to hear documents using Amazon Textract and Amazon Polly"
excerpt: "At the 2021 AWS re:Invent conference in Las Vegas, we demoed Read For Me at the AWS Builders Fair—a website that helps the visually impaired hear documents. For better quality, view the video here. Adaptive technology and accessibility features are often expensive, if they’re available at all. Audio"
